title: Is giving an ANTHE (Aakash Institute's Scholarship Exam) worth it? - Quora

response.answer_text: ANTHE is nothing but aakash admission marketing, as per my knowledge very few student get actual benefit from ANTHE. AAKASH take Rs 500/- for registration fees , which means more than 5 to 10 core aakash earn from ANTHE scholarship test.i recommend it is better if you appear Aims scholarship Test ( AST) , this scholarship exam is Free of cost and you can get upto 100 percent scholarship easily.
